feed.title: GitHub Elixir Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Elixir in GitHub

entry.title: brainlid/langchain
entry.summary: Elixir implementation of a LangChain style framework.

entry.title: BeaconCMS/beacon_demo
entry.summary: Sample application running Beacon, a open-source content management system (CMS) built with Phoenix LiveView.

entry.title: OpenFn/Lightning
entry.summary: The newest version of OpenFn's existing DPG, Lightning ⚡️ provides a web UI to visually manage complex workflow automation projects.
